title: Sanctions have led to Iran's oil industry falling behind -Iran oil minister
text:
GENEVA, Oct 8 (Reuters) - Sanctions have led to Iran's oil industry falling behind but Iran will resist, Iranian Oil Minister Bijan Zanganeh said on Tuesday, according to the semi-official Mehr news agency.

"The conditions in Iran are in a way that once every few years the oil industry receives a deadly blow and the economic sanctions can be considered one of those," he said. "This has caused Iran's oil industry to fall behind from the international position and space but we will resist in this area."







(Reporting By Babak Dehghanpisheh; Editing by Tom Hogue)
